author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
We're back with The Indie Hour Episode Twenty-Five! This series focuses on games you may have never even heard of and gives us an inside look at the wider world of independantly published Tabletop Wargames of all genres.
ALTAR OF THE DEADS GODS brings us a Grid-Based kitchen table game that uses any miniatures, set in the ancient cyclopean labyrinth of an ancient Eldritch God. Think BloodBorne meats Elden Ring meets Mordheim. Vampires fight Witch Hunters, fight Cultists in the winding tomb of a dead star god. You got the idea. Let's dive in!

Check out the DEAD GODS Rulebook HERE: https://www.wargamevault.com/product/509565/Altar-of-the-Dead-Gods?affiliate_id=210041
title: The GMG Indie Hour Ep 025 - ALTAR OF THE DEAD GODS by PWork Games
